com.netflix.genie.server.services

Interface CommandConfigService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandConfigServiceJPAImpl

    @Validated
public interface CommandConfigService
    Abstraction layer to encapsulate CommandConfig functionality.
    Classes implementing this abstraction layer must be thread-safe.

        The command created

      • getCommands

        java.util.List<com.netflix.genie.common.model.Command> getCommands(java.lang.String name,
                                                                   java.lang.String userName,
                                                                   java.util.Set<com.netflix.genie.common.model.CommandStatus> statuses,
                                                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                   int page,
                                                                   int limit,
                                                                   boolean descending,
                                                                   java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderBys)
        Get command configurations for given filter criteria.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of command config
        userName - The name of the user who created the configuration
        statuses - The status of the applications to get. Can be null.
        tags - tags allocated to this command
        page - Page number to start results on
        limit - Max number of results per page
        descending - Whether the results should be returned in descending or ascending order
        orderBys - The fields to order the results by
        Returns:
        All the commands matching the specified criteria

      • addConfigsForCommand

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> addConfigsForCommand(@NotBlank(message="No command id entered. Unable to add configurations.")

                                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> configs)
                                              throws com.netflix.genie.common.exceptions.GenieException

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the command to add the configuration file to. Not null/empty/blank.

        Returns:
        The active set of configurations
